question.qText: Based on the passage, which of the following statements is true?

aBtn.aText: In general, middle-class Britons ate very few vegetables.
In general, the middle-class British diet had little variety.
In general, middle-class Britons ate mostly beef.
In general, middle-class Britons attempted to buy and use food in season.
In general, British food was very bland and unseasoned.
